A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Thank you Disney. After years of spending money watching theses films over and over again\, buying the toys for myself as a kid\, and then for the kids\, you've crushed and abandoned all of the mystery\, menace and excitement out of it\, and I am liberated. I will now never spend anything on this \, sliced it dead like the paltry and dismissive end of snoke. My one regret is that I ever cared about this in the first place. If only I'd known on that awe inspiring day in §977 when I walked into the cinema with my dad that a  long time a go in a galaxy far far away there was Ryan Johnson waiting to take a dump on us mugs.
